title: The Science of Recovery and Covid, via Whoop
itunes:title: The Science of Recovery and Covid, via Whoop
description:
You won't flag down an Uber with your Whoop, but founder and CEO Will Ahmed says if you want health monitoring, it's the best game in town. Will joins Jason, Barr, and Lynch to talk about the booming industry of fitness tracking, the major investors and athletes involved in the business, and how "I feel pretty good today" isn't actually a winning strategy for peak performance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
